fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: The Cyprus Consumers Union & Quality of Life is active ember of the European Consumers Consultative Group and also active member of ANEC, for safe products Standardization
organisation_name: Cyprus Consumers Union & Quality of Life (PEKPIZO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Surveys, lobbing, media presentation, web page, facebook group and news letter 
Participates in Parliamentarian Committees and Government Consultative Committees and Representative Boards
goals__remit: PEKPIZO is a non profit, non government and non political organization for protecting the Cypriot consumers rights and interests
